dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6310 IH: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend incentive payments for participation in eligible alternative payment models under the Medicare program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ruiz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend incentive payments for participation in eligible alternative payment models under the Medicare program.

section.header: Extending incentive payments for participation in eligible alternative payment models under the Medicare program
section.text: Section 1833(z) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395l(z)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and ending with 2025 and inserting and ending with 2027; and
by striking with respect to 2025 and inserting with respect to each of years 2025 through 2027; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking with respect to 2025 and inserting with respect to each of years 2025 through 2027.
